content.content: Ev page contains important disclosures regarding my angel investing activities. Please read this information carefully before contacting me about investment opportunities.
Personal Capital Only

I invest my own personal money. I am **not** a venture capital fund, I do **not** manage a fund, and I do **not** accept capital from limited partners (LPs) or any other external investors. All investment decisions are made solely by me using my own funds.
Not Investment Advice

Nothing on this website should be construed as investment, legal, accounting, tax, or life advice. I am **not** authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) or any other financial regulatory body. Any investment decisions you make are your own responsibility.
No Fiduciary Duty
I do not owe any fiduciary duty to founders or companies I invest in beyond what is set out in the relevant investment documentation. I am an investor, not an advisor, director, or fiduciary.
Not a Solicitation

Nothing on this website constitutes a solicitation, offer, or recommendation to invest in any company, security, or investment product. Any information about my portfolio companies is for informational purposes only.
No Guarantee of Investment
Contacting me or sending me your pitch does **not** guarantee that I will invest. I review opportunities selectively and invest in very few companies each year (maximum 1-2).
Limited Availability

I'm currently a full-time founder and plan to be one for the foreseeable future, so I cannot allocate full-time attention to portfolio companies. I usually only invest in companies building in similar environments to what I am currently or have built in the past, so I can directly help with problem-solving.
No Advisory Relationships

I do not advise companies or founders. I think advisors are misaligned (unless for really late-stage companies) â€” [watch Steve Jobs explain why](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). I only angel invest in founders and ideas I want to get involved with and think I can help build.
Early Stage Focus

I am probably not going to be helpful to later-stage founders. I am early stage myself and can best help people at the earliest stages (before Series A). But if you are a late-stage founder and think I could be helpful, I'm still interested.
Tax Considerations

Any tax reliefs mentioned (such as SEIS or EIS) are subject to individual circumstances and HMRC rules. You should seek independent tax advice. I make no representations about the tax status of any investment.
Confidentiality

If you share confidential information with me, I will treat it with reasonable care, but I cannot guarantee absolute confidentiality. I may be exposed to similar ideas from other founders. Do not share information you are not comfortable disclosing. Unless I have signed a separate written confidentiality agreement with you, I have no obligation to treat information you send me as confidential.
Conflicts of Interest

I may invest in companies that compete with each other or with companies you are building. I am under no obligation to disclose my other investments to you, and I am under no obligation to refrain from investing in competing companies.
Risk Warning

**Angel investing in early-stage companies involves a high degree of risk.** You could lose your entire investment. Past performance is not indicative of future results. The value of investments can go down as well as up. Early-stage investments are illiquid and you may not be able to sell your shares for many years, if ever.

content.title: UK Investor Status
content.content: I am a **Self-Certified Sophisticated Investor** under the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. I qualify on the basis of having worked in a professional capacity in the provision of finance for small and medium enterprises within the past two years (as a contractor for blockchain accelerator programs involving early-stage investment).
content.note: **For Founders:** By sharing investment materials with me, you confirm that you have conducted appropriate checks under the UK Financial Promotions regime and reasonably believe I am eligible to receive such communications. If you need me to sign a self-certification form before sharing your pitch, I'm happy to do so.
